description:
Private Rolf Zaidel was the younger brother of http://anidb.net/ch114050 [Alanus Zaidel]. Unexpectedly for the the son of a factory manager, he went to art school, and won a national level prize for sculpture while at high school. He initially resents Reinhardt for perceived favouritism in being a junior officer, while, though older, he is himself still only a private. This turns into admiration and loyalty after Reinhardt saves his life during a space walk gone wrong.
He dies of a blaster shot, saving Reinhardt from Beltram during a power struggle for control of the bridge.
name: Rolf Zaidel
